name: little doggo BIG adventure
description:
little doggo BIG adventure

What does a pomeranian out for a stroll encounter on it's day, and does that even matter when you have SO MUCH ENERGY that all you can do is bark at everything that comes your way. BARK BARK BARK!!

Yell your way to survive and collect more doggie coins to spend in the clothes store!

Controls

Recommended to be be played with mouse. 

Alternative buttons assigned to controller and keyboard (D and Space).

Press S or P to pause for the store.

Assets

Code and art by Assassiowl

with InControl and DOTween

Music and SFX from asset store
